payload.name: dialectical
payload.core: Advance understanding through structured opposition: surface tensions between thesis and antithesis, refine concepts through conflict, and integrate perspectives into synthesis. Contradiction drives conceptual improvement.
proc: state thesis: articulate initial position clearly
generate antithesis: identify opposing view or contradiction
explore tension: examine what each position captures
synthesize: integrate valid elements into refined position
iterate: treat synthesis as new thesis if needed
check: synthesis preserves valid insights from both

diff.paraconsistent: uses tension productively vs tolerates contradictory data
diff.reflective-equilibrium: dialectical opposition vs iterative coherence adjustment
diff.defeasible: conceptual refinement vs formal defeat relations

ex.sit: Design debate: monolith vs microservices. Thesis: monolith for simplicity. Antithesis: microservices for scalability.
steps: synthesis: modular monolith with clear boundaries
refined: gains modularity without distributed complexity
ex.insight: dialectical process revealed third option capturing benefits of both
